content:
Ordered Collections: Creation

  • Problem:

    • How is the initial state of a compound document created?

  • Proposed solution:

    • Specify the behavior of submitting a MIME multipart/related message with MKCOL (or PUT).
    • Pro:
      • Uses existing standard container package
    • Con:
      • Needed at all? Can create a collection, lock it, then PUT individual members.
